summary: This module supplies a suite of reusable form classes that implement the core authentication workflows of Django, including login validation, password changes, password resets with email delivery, user creation and modification, and admin password updates, along with read‑only password display and username handling.
business_intent: To provide developers with ready‑made, secure form components for managing user credentials and authentication processes, reducing the need for custom validation, token handling, and email integration when building web applications.
